entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
